alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Monroe and eastern Lenawee Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Adrian, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Blissfield and Britton around 520 PM EDT. Deerfield around 525 PM EDT. Petersburg around 530 PM EDT. Dundee around 535 PM EDT. Ida around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Jasper, Azalia, Cone, Macon, Riga, Ridgeway, Palmyra, Fairfield, Holloway and Samaria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
